name: D3
description:
Our submission to Giant Rom 3. It was made over the course of a few days. It's not the most polished thing in the world, but it was built with love. Good luck with this thing.

After losing the loser leaves town stipulation Dan has decided to create his own video game. He however needs to appease his former co workers to get the word out there!

Press 1, 2 and 3 to switch between themes to appease the duders.
Each duder has different likes and dislikes.

By standing in the spotlight you fill the power meter which when full allows an inspirational message to be announced.

After 1 minute a review score will determine how well the player performed ranging from 1 to 5 stars.

FEATURE: Supports ALT+F4 as (the only) method of closing!

Music Credits - Last Kiss Goodnight - Kevin Macleod Incompetech.
